remarks: Closure law for segment transport.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: transportcl $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) /\ ( C e. ( EE ` N ) /\ D e. ( EE ` N ) ) /\ C =/= D ) ) -> ( <. A , B >. TransportTo <. C , D >. ) e. ( EE ` N ) ) $.
